What is Postpartum Depression (PPD)?

Postpartum depression is a serious mental health condition that can occur after childbirth. 
It's more than just "baby blues" and can affect any new mother.

Key points:

• It's a common condition affecting up to 1 in 7 new mothers

• It can start anytime during the first year after giving birth

• It's not a sign of weakness or being a bad mother

• It's treatable with proper support and care
